How To Use

Using the Data Calculator

Follow these simple steps to get your results

1

Select Your Activities

Choose the activities you do regularly - streaming, social media, video calls, gaming, etc.

2

Set Usage Frequency

Indicate how often and how long you spend on each activity per day or week.

3

Choose Quality Settings

Select your preferred streaming quality (SD, HD, or 4K) for accurate estimates.

4

Get Your Estimate

See your estimated monthly data usage and which Vouch plan is right for you.

Why This Matters

Why Understanding Your Data Usage Matters

Many people pay for more data than they need, while others hit frustrating data caps. Understanding your actual usage helps you choose the right plan. With Vouch's unlimited data, you don't have to worry - but it's still useful to know your habits.

  • Video streaming uses the most data: 1-8 GB per hour depending on quality
  • Social media with autoplay videos can use 1-2 GB per hour
  • Music streaming is efficient at only 50-150 MB per hour
  • Most people overestimate their data needs

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions about the Data Calculator

Our estimates are based on industry-standard data consumption rates. Actual usage varies based on app settings, video quality, and compression. Use this as a helpful guide, not an exact measurement.

Video streaming is the biggest data consumer. Watching Netflix in HD uses about 3 GB per hour, while 4K can use 7+ GB per hour. Social media with autoplay videos is the second biggest user.

If you regularly stream video, use social media, or work remotely with video calls, unlimited data provides peace of mind. Light users who mainly text and browse may be fine with less.

Vouch's unlimited plans provide full-speed data for typical usage. During network congestion, data may be temporarily prioritized, but you'll never hit a hard cap or overage charge.
